original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 323.90/324.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed flat at 323.90/324.00 to the US dollar on Friday, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.60/75 percent from 13.55/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.80/95 percent from 13.80/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed stable at 14.10/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2030 closed stable at 14.05/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.05/30 percent, from 14.10/30 percent. (Colombo/Dec29/2023)
